root.description: Night lays thick under the [trees] of the woods.

exit.description: The [village] is not far off. Pale candle light can still be seen in the windows.
exit.onCheck: The [village] seems more cheerful and inviting with every step you take away from it.
Thorn plants twist and catch each other behind the [bushes] like a spider's web. You can just make out a slight path through the thorns.

prop.onCheck: The [trees] have no scratches or markings on them, though their bark is dry and brittle.

prop.description: The [path] itself is of trodden dirt.
prop.onCheck: The [path] is clear of root and twig, but [crumbs] lie about it. The [crumbs] seem out of place.
They are bread [crumbs]. Following each other in a single file, they (go) into the [woods] through a small gap in the [bushes].

character.description:
[Jack] leads you on, being careful not to get too far ahead of you.
Jack: "I heard the howls of wolves two nights ago coming from these woods. I haven't seen Joss since that afternoon. I've been looking for a sign, but nothing seems to point to where he might be. Perhaps a witcher like you could (check) out the surroundings and find a clue."
To (check) something out, type "check" followed by the name of the thing you want to (check) and hit ENTER.
To (check) the [bushes], type "check bushes" and hit ENTER.
character.onCheck: Jack looks around at the tree tops.
character.onTalk: Jack: "Don't look at me! I've been searching for a sign all day."
